source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
      SalesShipmentHeader.[No_]                      AS ShipmentNo
     ,[Sell-to Customer No_]                         AS SellToCustomerNo
     ,[Bill-to Customer No_]                         AS BillToCustomerNo
     ,[Bill-to Name]                                 AS BillToName
     ,[Posting Date]                                 AS PostingDate
     ,[Shipment Date]                                AS ShipmentDate
     ,[SalesShipmentHeaderExt].[Shpfy Order No_$ec255f57-31d0-4ca2-b751-f2fa7c745abb] AS ShopifyOrderNo

FROM 
    [CRONUS].[dbo].[CDD$Sales Shipment Header$437dbf0e-84ff-417a-965d-ed2bb9650972] AS SalesShipmentHeader
INNER JOIN
    [CRONUS].[dbo].[CDD$Sales Shipment Header$437dbf0e-84ff-417a-965d-ed2bb9650972$ext] AS SalesShipmentHeaderExt
ON
    SalesShipmentHeader.No_ = SalesShipmentHeaderExt.No_
